job.title: Production Support Software Engineer- CCE - Mulesoft
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongProduction Support  Customer Centric EngineeringbrbrLocation San FranciscobrbrstronguAbout Mulesoft a Salesforce CompanybrbrustrongMuleSoft makes it easy to connect the worlds applications data and devices We provide a flexible unified software platform that enables organizations to easily build application networks using APIs  the digital glue that allows applications to talk to each other and exchange data MuleSoft is at the heart of the applications and services you use every day like Netflix Spotify and Salesforce from Global 500 corporations to emerging companies in more than 60 countriesbrbrstronguJob DetailsbrbrustrongJoin a high impact Mulesoft engineering team that delivers Customer Love by solving the toughesttechnical customer escalations fast and champions trust strategy throughout the companybrbrAt Mulesoft trust is our 1 priority Our cloud applications handle billions of transactions each dayfor companies who demand high quality responsiveness and predictability Performance issues and functional bugs must be identified and resolved quickly As a Customer Centric Engineer within RampD you will investigate reproduce and diagnose complex issues affecting our customers You shouldbe passionate about solving tough technical problems and recommending improvements to products and processes Technical skills are important but so are persistence patience and communicationbrbrstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrustrongulliUsing your Java database Cloud infrastructure and API frameworks skills to solve criticalcustomer technical escalations to RampD from our Technical Support organization in a timely mannerliliWork together with Technical Support team on alleviating customer from current issue theyfaceliliFiguring out ways to find the bug utilizing topnotch troubleshooting techniques and all the tools and systems available within the RampD organization and digging deep into codeliliIdentifying root causes proposing test cases and fixes and developing new debugging tools while working closely with product teamsliliProviding timely information to customer facing teams to improve overall customersatisfactionliliMentoring Technical Support on technical issues and best practicesliliBuilding relationships with other teams across Customer Services RampD and data centeroperations as a technical expertliliProvide expert opinion as RampD when required during an incidentliliChampioning Support and Debug initiatives throughout RampDbrliulstronguWhat Were Looking ForbrustrongulliDeveloperlevel technical chops along with a strong desire to interact with customers support engineers and management on highprofile issues critical to the longterm successof the companyliliDemonstrable curiosity passion integrity and outstanding attention to detail in professional and personal pursuitsliliUnparalleled troubleshooting and problemsolving skillsliliExcellent written and verbal communication skills as exemplified by clear bugissue explanations documentation of knowledge mentoring ability and comfort interacting withall levels of managementliliBachelors Degree BS or MS in Computer Science preferredbrliulstronguRequired Technical SkillsbrustrongulliFluency in an object oriented language Java preferredliliExperience with a known IDE Eclipse or IntelliJliliPrior experience building tools frameworks to automate product functionality building API driven applications and CICD pipelinesliliFamiliarity with core web technologies HTTP JSON REST XMLliliExperience using Linux environments and Cloud technologiesbrliulem For Coloradobased roles Minimum annual salary of 121800 You may also be offered a bonus restricted stock units and benefits More details about our company benefits can be found at the following link em emu httpswwwgetsalesforcebenefitscom brbruemstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the
